subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Thursday’s Knicks-Nets matchup, part of a TNT doubleheader, was supposed to be a preview of the playoffs, not a rebuff of the strategy of trying to win with aging, overpriced players.
snippet: Thursday’s Knicks-Nets matchup, part of a TNT doubleheader, was supposed to be a preview of the playoffs, not a rebuff of the strategy of trying to win with aging, overpriced players.
